humanUpgrades.name: Popup Shield
humanUpgrades.description: Shields can block on hits except for large ammo. Transferable upon zombification.

humanUpgrades.name: Leg Augmentation
humanUpgrades.description: A player can crawl during bleeding (1 step per count)

humanUpgrades.name: Barrier of Protection
humanUpgrades.description: A flexible hoop where any human inside the circle is immune to undead tags but not dart tags. Lasts 1 min.

humanUpgrades.name: Resurrection.exe
humanUpgrades.description: Provides an extra life against undead tags.

humanUpgrades.name: Platinum Insurance Policy
humanUpgrades.description: Instantly ends the bleed-out timer when used.

humanUpgrades.name: Medtech
humanUpgrades.description: Can un-stun players by placing a hand on the back or an arm for 10 seconds. The stunned player cannot move while being un-stunned.

undeadUpgrades.name: Named NPC
undeadUpgrades.description: Must walk. Carries a large weapon that stuns players. Only affected by large ammo (mega, socks, rockets, etc.)

undeadUpgrades.name: Shield cyberpsychos
undeadUpgrades.description: Cannot tag. Behaves like human shields.

undeadUpgrades.name: Tank
undeadUpgrades.description: Must walk. Tags using two-hand rules (Two pool noodles). Only affected by large ammo (mega, socks, rockets, etc.)

undeadUpgrades.name: Medtech
undeadUpgrades.description: Wear a sash with flags. It can revive up to 5 zombies quickly. Must respawn to gain flags back.

undeadUpgrades.name: E.P.L. (Electrifying projectile launcher
undeadUpgrades.description: Wears a green sash. Carries 1 - 3 brains. Tags using two-hand rules.

undeadUpgrades.name: Mantis Blades
undeadUpgrades.description: Uses pool noodles to extend the range. Noodle size increases with upgrades.

undeadUpgrades.name: Conga Malware
undeadUpgrades.description: Must Walk. Multiple zombies are attached together. Still dangerous until all zombies in line are tagged.

items.name: Bitcoin
items.description: 100 Eurodollars used to purchases items from the shop.

items.name: Datashard
items.description: Datashard gives your faction 1 victory point when brought back to their faction’s base.

items.name: Crates
items.description: crates give 5 victory points when brought back to their faction’s base.

items.name: Health Boosters
items.description: when turned in to your base Moderator, will provide that player with an extra life.

items.name: MaxDoc Inhaler
items.description: when turned in to your base Moderator, will give that player two extra lives.

items.name: Found Intel
items.description: When exchanged with an NPC. They will provide hints for their corresponding quest.
